item.title: Understanding Maven core for plugin Development
item.description: Deep dive into maven’s dependency management and classloader system to help the development of plugins

item.title: Environment Variables in Java
item.description: This post gives an overview of the different ways to manage configuration parameters for software applications in general, and focuses on the management of secrets with environment variables for applications written in java.

item.title: Clickhouse 101 - Data Structures and internals
item.description: First article of the clickhouse 101 series. Let’s deep dive to the underlying data structures and internal mechanisms of clickhouse
